meanings.sent1: The stray cat looked gaunter than usual after not eating for days.
meanings.sent2: She noticed her reflection in the mirror looking gaunter than before.
meanings.sent3: The gaunter scarecrow in the field seemed to be on a diet.
meanings.sent4: The gaunter shadows of the evening stretched across the room.
meanings.sent5: The gaunter trees in winter stood bare against the gray sky.

meanings.sent1: If you skip meals, you may gaunter over time.
meanings.sent2: The illness caused him to gaunter rapidly.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her pet fish would gaunter if it kept swimming so much.
meanings.sent4: The marathon training made him gaunter but stronger.
meanings.sent5: The lack of rain made the plants gaunter in the dry soil.
